title: sst_importer: file may not be rewritten properly while repeating restoration
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
v6.5.4

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
Linux, x86_64.

### Steps to reproduce
1. `Restore point` to a new cluster.
2. Drop the tables restored.
3. In 60 seconds, rerun the restore.

### What did you expect?
Restore success and get the same result as the initial restore.

### What did happened?
Some of data lost.
